name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Stacey E. FOX, Appellant

judges: Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Stacey E. FOX, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Judgment of sentence affirmed. See Commonwealth v. Story, 476 Pa. 391, 383 A.2d 155 (1978) (harmless error).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Thomas G. Klingensmith, Asst. Public Defender, for appellant.
Edward F. Browne, Jr., Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
455 A.2d 1186
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Stacey E. FOX, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 25, 1983.
Decided Feb. 2, 1983.
Thomas G. Klingensmith, Asst. Public Defender, for appellant.
Edward F. Browne, Jr., Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
